about_the_game:
Elephant Games is back with the latest bewitching installment of the Cursed Fables series!

Tonight will be a magical masquerade ball to remember! The neighboring kingdoms are visiting, hoping the prince will choose one of their princesses as his bride. As the court sorceress, you’ll be in attendance and expected to use your gifts of foresight to see into people’s future. But what should be an exciting occasion takes a drastically dark turn when the prince is turned into a monster, and you take the blame! Now, it’s a race against the clock to navigate the now sinister transformed castle, track down the prince, and find out who was behind an attack that could start a war between the kingdoms! Can you save the realm and clear your name before it’s too late? Find out in this spellbinding Hidden-Object Puzzle adventure!

This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version.

The Collector’s Edition includes:

  • Discover what is frightening the Princess in the bonus game!

  • Replay your favorite HOPs and mini-games and earn achievements!

  • Tons of collectible cards and hidden roses to find!

  • Enjoy exclusive wallpapers, a screensaver, music, and more!

  • Never get lost with the strategy guide!

This is a Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game, meaning a specific genre of story-driven, point & click adventures. Throughout the game, players are tasked to find a list of objects hidden within a particular scene, and to occasionally complete various mini-games/puzzles.
